name: Candidate selection
explanation: 1 candidate species matched with high stringency (identity ≥ 98.5%)
outcome: Positive species identification

name: Candidate selection
explanation: 2-3 candidate species matched with high stringency (identity ≥ 98.5%)
outcome: The analyst should attempt subjective species identification at the genus level

name: Candidate selection
explanation: >3 candidate species matched with high stringency (identity ≥ 98.5%)
outcome: The analyst should attempt subjective species identification at the genus level

name: Candidate selection
explanation: At least one candidate species matched with moderate stringency (identity ≥93.5% and <98.5%)
outcome: The analyst should attempt subjective species identification at the genus level

name: Candidate selection
explanation: No candidate species matched
outcome: Identification not possible (potential unknown species)

name: Taxa of interest analysis
explanation: Taxon of interest detected in candidate species
outcome: At least one of the taxa of interest matched the candidates species

name: Taxa of interest analysis
explanation: Taxon of interest NOT detected in candidate species
outcome: None of the taxa of interest matched the candidates species

name: Taxa of interest analysis
explanation: No Taxa of Interest were provided
outcome: Could not be assessed

name: Supporting publications
explanation: Matching sequence records for this species are from >5 independent sources
outcome: Reference sequences are from diverse sources and therefore likely to be reliable

name: Supporting publications
explanation: Matching sequence records for this species have only 1-5 independent sources
outcome: Reference sequence sources lack diversity and may therefore be unreliable

name: Database coverage
explanation: Criteria to perform this analysis were not met
outcome: Database coverage could not be assessed for this taxon.

name: Database coverage
explanation: Locus was not provided for this sample
outcome: Database coverage could not be fully assessed for this taxon.

name: Database representation for target taxon
explanation: The given locus for this taxon is well represented in reference database (>5 entries)
outcome: The reference data supports this taxon well

name: Database representation for target taxon
explanation: The given locus for this taxon has limited representation in reference database (≤5 entries)
outcome: The reference data has some support for this taxon

name: Database representation for target taxon
explanation: The given locus for this taxon is not present in reference database (0 entries)
outcome: The reference data are likely to be unreliable for this species

name: Database representation for target taxon
explanation: Assessment of related species is only possible for taxa at rank genus/species
outcome: This taxon could not be fully assessed

name: Database representation for target taxon
explanation: Please see error messages displayed in the Database Coverage report
outcome: The analysis could not be completed because an error occurred

name: Database representation for related species
explanation: >90% of related taxa have reference sequence(s) at the given locus
outcome: The reference data supports species in this genus well

name: Database representation for related species
explanation: 10-90% of related taxa have reference sequence(s) at the given locus
outcome: The reference data offers some support for species in this genus

name: Database representation for related species
explanation: ≤10% of taxon have reference sequence(s) at the given locus
outcome: The reference data offers little support for species in this genus

name: Database representation for related species
explanation: Assessment of related species is only possible for taxa at rank genus/species
outcome: This taxon could not be fully assessed

name: Database representation for related species
explanation: Please see error messages displayed in the Database Coverage report
outcome: The analysis could not be completed because an error occurred

name: Database representation for related species in country of origin
explanation: All species in genus from country of origin have reference sequence(s) for this locus
outcome: The reference data supports species in this genus well, when we evaluate only species that occur in the sample's country of origin

name: Database representation for related species in country of origin
explanation: Not all species in genus from the country of origin have reference sequence(s) for this locus
outcome: The reference data offers some support for species in this genus, when we evaluate only species that occur in the sample's country of origin

name: Database representation for related species in country of origin
explanation: No species in genus have been observed in the country of origin
outcome: It's unlikely that the true taxonomic identity is another species in this genus, because no others have been recorded in the sample's country of origin

name: Database representation for related species in country of origin
explanation: Assessment of related species is only possible for taxa at rank genus/species
outcome: This taxon could not be fully assessed

name: Database representation for related species in country of origin
explanation: Please see error messages displayed in the Database Coverage report
outcome: The analysis could not be completed because an error occurred

name: Phylogenetic assessment
explanation: Candidate species grouped within single clade
outcome: The query sequence is genetically consistent with sequences of the best-matching species

name: Phylogenetic assessment
explanation: The query sequence clusters as sister to a species-specific clade or as a single branch in a tree
outcome: The sample is genetically distinct from the sequences of the best-matching species, and may lack representation in the reference database. This indicates that the sample organism is either poorly studied or a potential novel species.

name: Phylogenetic assessment
explanation: Genotype diversity grouped into multiple diverse groups
outcome: The top candidate species cannot be confidently distinguished from other related species

name: Preliminary identification confirmation
explanation: Identified species is consistent with preliminary ID
outcome: The preliminary identification is supported by the molecular data

name: Preliminary identification confirmation
explanation: Identified species is not consistent with preliminary ID
outcome: The molecular data contradicts the preliminary identification

name: Preliminary identification confirmation
explanation: Insufficient evidence due to inconclusive taxonomy of the sample
outcome: Cannot confirm or reject the preliminary ID
